title: ALG OUT 15%
long_description: ALG OUT 15% quickly destroys algae in pool water. When used as part of a weekly maintenance routine, ALG OUT  15% will also help to prevent algae growth. ALG OUT 15% treats a wide variety of algae (green, yellow and black).
short_description: BENEFIT Controls algae in pool water FORMAT 4 L

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour ALG OUT 15% directly into the water, all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add ALG OUT 15% according to the recommended application method and dosage. Wait 5 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: When there is no visible algae in the swimming pool water, the initial dosage is 135 mL of ALG OUT 15% per 10,000 L of pool water. Weekly maintenance dosage is 70 mL of ALG OUT 15% per 10,000 L of pool water. For visible algae, when superchlorination is not employed, add 335 mL of ALG OUT 15% per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: Compatible with salt system. DO NOT apply when swimmers are in the pool.
